mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY ( INQUIRY_CODE, USER_CODE, TITLE, CONTENT, TYPE, REG_DATE, INQUIRY_STATUS ) VALUES ( 'IQ' || LPAD(INQUIRY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 8, '0'), #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{type}, SYSDATE, '대기' )
mapper.select: SELECT i.INQUIRY_CODE AS inquiryNo, i.TITLE AS title, i.CONTENT AS content, i.TYPE AS type, i.REG_DATE AS regDate, i.INQUIRY_STATUS AS status, a.ANSWER_NO AS answerNo, a.ADMIN_ID AS adminId, a.ANSWER_CONTENT AS answerContent, a.ANSWER_DATE AS answerDate FROM INQUIRY i LEFT JOIN INQUIRY_ANSWER a ON i.INQUIRY_CODE = a.INQUIRY_CODE WHERE i.INQUIRY_CODE = #{inquiryNo}

SELECT i.INQUIRY_CODE AS inquiryNo, i.TYPE AS type, i.TITLE AS title, i.REG_DATE AS regDate, i.INQUIRY_STATUS AS status, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INQUIRY_ANSWER a WHERE a.INQUIRY_CODE = i.INQUIRY_CODE) AS answerCount FROM INQUIRY i WHERE i.USER_CODE = #{userId} ORDER BY i.REG_DATE DESC
SELECT i.INQUIRY_CODE AS inquiryNo, i.USER_CODE AS userId, i.TITLE AS title, i.TYPE AS type, i.REG_DATE AS regDate, i.INQUIRY_STATUS AS status FROM INQUIRY i ORDER BY i.REG_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY_ANSWER ( ANSWER_NO, INQUIRY_CODE, ADMIN_ID, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSWER_DATE ) VALUES ( INQUIRY_ANSWER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{inquiryNo}, #{adminId}, #{answerContent}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT ANSWER_NO AS answerNo, INQUIRY_CODE AS inquiryNo, ADMIN_ID AS adminId, ANSWER_CONTENT AS answerContent, ANSWER_DATE AS answerDate FROM INQUIRY_ANSWER WHERE INQUIRY_CODE = #{inquiryNo} ORDER BY ANSWER_DATE
